thread.title: Grab a charm! Fallout 4’s final S.P.E.C.I.A.L. video covers Luck
thread.title_full: Grab a charm! Fallout 4’s final S.P.E.C.I.A.L. video covers Luck

author: News Zombie
title: Grab a charm! Fallout 4’s final S.P.E.C.I.A.L. video covers Luck
text:
Bethesda has released the final entry in their S.P.E.C.I.A.L. video series for Fallout 4. The last topic is Luck. With Fortuna on their side, players will be able to find better loot when scavenging and score more critical shots. 
Fallout 4 is scheduled to launch on November 10 for PC, PS4, and Xbox One. 
–
